## 792. ROAD
### Definition
The most typical kind of walkway for the given region (path, trail, serpentine etc.); in many cultures, ‘path’ is the correct equivalent (since ‘road’ may be taken to represent a cultural term imposed by a technologically superior civilization). (GLD)

### Contexts
1. There is a road from my village to the next one, but no road to the far away village. (GLD) 2. He is walking on the road. (GLD)
